thread.section_title: Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: One of the best luxurious hotel I have visited
thread.title_full: One of the best luxurious hotel I have visited - Review of Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pathamaporn M
title: One of the best luxurious hotel I have visited
text:
Great service. Super duper comfy bed and pillows. Well equipped with all amenities. Breakfast was yummy with varieties of choices. Great location - it's a short distance to Arc de Triomphe. Worth the money.
Green Features: Meet the standard practices but I did not observe much that time.
